trans-unit.source: Provides text writer functionality for devices targeted by the HTML adapter set.
trans-unit.target: 为 HTML 适配器集面向的设备提供文本编写器功能。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />；权限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />。

trans-unit.source: The base writer object.
trans-unit.target: 编写器基对象。

trans-unit.source: An object of <see cref="T:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities" /> class that provides the capability information for the specific device.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities" /> 类的一个对象，该类为特定设备提供功能信息。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the specified class.
trans-unit.target: 创建指定类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: Adapters are usually constructed automatically by ASP.NET and must have a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 适配器通常通过 ASP.NET 自动构造，并且必须具有默认构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Starts a new Style block.
trans-unit.target: 开始新的 Style 块。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlMobileTextWriter.EndStyleContext%2A> method to complete the Style block.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlMobileTextWriter.EndStyleContext%2A>方法以完成样式块。

trans-unit.source: Completes a new Style block.
trans-unit.target: 完成新的 Style 块。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlMobileTextWriter.BeginStyleContext%2A> method to start the Style block.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlMobileTextWriter.BeginStyleContext%2A>方法以启动样式块。

trans-unit.source: The style reference.
trans-unit.target: 样式引用。

trans-unit.source: Begins a block by using the character formatting from a specified style.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定样式的字符格式设置开始操作块。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: The style reference.
trans-unit.target: 样式引用。

trans-unit.source: Begins a block by using the layout and character formatting from a given style.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用给定样式中的布局和字符格式设置来开始一个块。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: The style reference.
trans-unit.target: 样式引用。

trans-unit.source: Begins a block by using the layout and character formatting from a given style.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用给定样式中的布局和字符格式设置来开始一个块。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlMobileTextWriter.EnterStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlMobileTextWriter.ExitStyle%2A> methods allow a device adapter to emit markup, in order to begin and end a block using the character formatting from a given style.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlMobileTextWriter.EnterStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.HtmlMobileTextWriter.ExitStyle%2A>方法允许使用设备适配器来发出标记，以便开始和结束使用给定样式中的字符格式的块。

trans-unit.source: Removes the current style, restores the previous style as the current formatting style, and optionally calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.WriteEndTag(System.String)" /> method to close the current element.
trans-unit.target: 移除当前样式，将上一个样式还原为当前格式设置样式，并选择调用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter.WriteEndTag(System.String)" /> 方法以关闭当前元素。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The style reference.
trans-unit.target: 样式引用。

trans-unit.source: Ends a block that has been using the character formatting from a specified style.
trans-unit.target: 结束一个块，该块一直在使用指定样式中的字符格式设置。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.

trans-unit.target: 样式引用。

trans-unit.source: If <c>breakAfter</c> is <see langword="true" />, a break is added after the closing style element.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>breakAfter</c> 为 <see langword="true" />，则在结束样式元素的后面添加一个分行符。

trans-unit.target: 指示正文的颜色属性是否可发送到输出流。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the body color attribute can be sent to the output stream; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果正文的颜色特性可以发送到输出流，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Contains a Boolean value that indicates whether to send the <see langword="italic" /> attribute to the target device.
trans-unit.target: 包含一个布尔值，该值指示是否将 <see langword="italic" /> 属性发送到目标设备。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the device does not support HTML <see langword="< br >" /> elements to format line breaks.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示设备是否不支持 HTML <see langword="< br >" /> 元素进行分行符格式设置。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 如果设备不支持 HTML <see langword="true" /> tags 标记，则为 <see langword="< br >" /> ；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The character to write to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 要写入到输出流的字符。

trans-unit.source: Writes the given character to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 将给定字符写入输出流。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The text to write to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 要写入输出流的文本。

trans-unit.source: Writes the text to the output stream, along with any pending tab spacing.
trans-unit.target: 将文本连同任何挂起的制表符间距一起写入输出流。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Writes any tab spacing and the opening tag of the specified markup element to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 将任何制表符间距和指定标记元素的开始标记写入到输出流。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: Writes a line break.
trans-unit.target: 写入一个分行符。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The text to encode and write to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 要进行编码并写入输出流的文本。

trans-unit.source: Encodes the specified text for the requesting device, and then writes it to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 对请求设备的指定文本进行编码，然后将其写入到输出流。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Writes any tab spacing and the opening tag of the specified markup element to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 将任何制表符间距和指定标记元素的开始标记写入到输出流。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The name of the hidden field.
trans-unit.target: 隐藏字段的名称。

trans-unit.source: The value of the hidden field.
trans-unit.target: 隐藏字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Writes a hidden field with the given name and value.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的名称和值编写隐藏字段。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: A hidden field is in the form \<input type="hidden" name="name" value="value">.
trans-unit.target: 隐藏的字段位于窗体\<输入类型 ="隐藏"名称 ="name"value ="value">。

trans-unit.source: The line terminator string to write.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的行终止符字符串。

trans-unit.source: Writes a line terminator string to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: 将行结束符字符串写入到输出流。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The text to write.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的文本。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, encodes the text.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则对文本进行编码。

trans-unit.source: Writes the given text, optionally with encoding.
trans-unit.target: 写入给定文本并选择是否对其进行编码。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: Encoding involves mapping characters with HTML/WML meanings to the appropriate character code.
trans-unit.target: 编码包括映射字符替换相应的字符代码的 HTML/WML 含义。

trans-unit.source: The parameter name to encode and write.
trans-unit.target: 要编码并写入的参数名。

trans-unit.source: The parameter value to encode and write.
trans-unit.target: 要编码并写入的参数值。

trans-unit.source: Writes an encoded URL parameter.
trans-unit.target: 写入经编码的 URL 参数。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: The parameter is written in the form `name=value`.
trans-unit.target: 在窗体中编写参数`name=value`。
